value.title: OCR support for 73 languages in the Cognitive Services Computer Vision public preview
value.excerpt: Computer Vision Read 3.2 API for Optical Character Recognition (OCR), part of Cognitive Services, announces its public preview with support for Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, and Korean, and several Latin languages, with option to use the cloud service or deploy the Docker container

value.title: HoloLens 2 Industrial Edition brings mixed reality to regulated environments
value.excerpt: It’s been an energizing first year, in-market, for HoloLens 2. We loved seeing the ways HoloLens 2 has empowered customers across industries to increase productivity and innovate with purpose.

value.title: General availability: Azure Machine Learning Output Datasets
value.excerpt: Read data in the cloud efficiently with Output datasets.

value.title: dunnhumby Extends Machine Learning Automation Tool Built on Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: Customer data science company dunnhumby is preparing to launch an Enterprise Edition of dunnhumby Model Lab, a machine learning automation tool for data scientists built on Microsoft Azure. As retailers and CPGs begin to reimagine their business operations,

value.title: Quorum announces re-platforming of data resources on Microsoft Azure to enable the future delivery of advanced analytics and artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: Quorum Information Technologies Inc. (TSX Venture: QIS) (Quorum) announced today that it is working with Microsoft in a re-platforming and data consolidation project utilizing Microsoft Azure Synapse Analytics.

value.title: Health tech company uses Azure and AI to create priority list for COVID vaccination shots
value.excerpt: Jvion's CORE platform uses AI and healthcare data from 30 million people to determine who should be vaccinated first.

value.title: Review: Microsoft Azure AI and Machine Learning aims for the enterprise
value.excerpt: Microsoft Azure combines a wide range of cognitive services and a solid platform for machine learning that supports automated ML, no-code/low-code ML, and Python-based notebooks.

value.title: Introducing Azure Health Bot—an evolution of Microsoft Healthcare Bot with new functionality
value.excerpt: Since the start of the pandemic, Microsoft Healthcare Bot has been at the leading edge of helping organizations be more agile with the patient engagement.

value.title: Microsoft's 'Studio Alpha' is bringing together Azure, gaming and AI for wargame simulation
value.excerpt: Microsoft is bringing together Azure, analytics, collaboration and gaming technologies to build out a 'serious gaming initiative' for military and commercial customers.

value.title: Machine Learning on Azure SQL Managed Instance now available
value.excerpt: Use machine learning capabilities on a Managed Instance of Azure SQL Database for ease of moving your data, packages, and models to a cloud ready environment fully configured for machine learning.

value.title: Harness analytical and predictive power with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Since its preview announcement, we’ve witnessed incredible excitement and adoption of Azure Synapse from our customers and partners.

value.title: Cognitive Services Speech adds new Neural TTS voices and general availability of Neural TTS in containers
value.excerpt: Speech service adds 10 new neural Text to Speech (TTS) voices and announces general availability of Neural TTS in containers.

value.title: Azure Machine Learning updates--November 2020
value.excerpt: Numerous updates across security, performance, experimentation and automated ML capabilities have been implemented.

value.title: Azure Cost Management and Billing updates – October 2020
value.excerpt: Last month, we shared a lot of cost optimization tips and tricks. Continuing with that focus, October is all about helping you save money on Azure infrastructure as a service (IaaS), database, or storage offerings. You'll also read about creating subscriptions via Azure Resource Manager deployment templates,

value.title: SQL Server on Virtual Machines: Machine Learning with Microsoft R Open 4.0.2 now available
value.excerpt: The latest update for Microsoft R Open 4.0.2 (downloadable for Windows, Mac, and Linux platforms) includes improvement to the performance of the merge function and adds an option to better handle zero-length arguments to the paste and paste0 functions.

value.title: Microsoft explains how it improved automatic image captioning in Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft says it developed a new AI and machine learning technique that vastly improves the accuracy of automatic image captions.

value.title: Announcing advanced Azure Machine Learning nanodegree program with Udacity
value.excerpt: Earlier this year we announced a free ‘introduction to Machine Learning’ course with Udacity, empowering 10,000 scholars from all over the world to learn the basics of machine learning. Today, we announce the new Machine Learning Engineer for Microsoft Azure Nanodegree Program on Udacity—students can

value.title: Deliver AI-powered application search with Azure Cognitive Search and BA Insight
value.excerpt: Data is growing exponentially, and over 80 percent of data is unstructured, creating a challenge for organizations to find and surface the right information to their customers. What organizations need is a solution that enables them to uncover latent insights from all their content by quickly identifying

value.title: Azure Machine Learning helps customers stay ahead of challenges
value.excerpt: Organizations today are striving to build agility and resilience to the fast-changing environment we live in. AI and machine learning innovation can help tackle these emerging challenges and enable cost efficiencies.

value.title: Azure Cognitive Services Translator Text— Assamese language now available
value.excerpt: Translator Text now supports the Assamese language.

value.title: New guided UI experience to deploy machine learning models in Azure Synapse Analytics (in preview)
value.excerpt: We are introducing a guided UI experience in the Synapse Studio that enables users to deploy machine learning models from the Azure Machine Learning model registry directly to Azure Synapse for inferencing.

value.title: How 'Microsoft Flight Simulator' became a 'living game' with Azure AI
value.excerpt: Flight Simulator is a triumph, one that fully captures the meditative experience of soaring through the clouds. But to bring the game to life,  and developer As

value.title: Accelerate analytics and AI workloads with Photon powered Delta Engine on Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Photon powered Delta Engine is a 100% Apache Spark-compatible vectorized query engine designed to take advantage of modern CPU architecture for extremely fast parallel processing of data.

value.title: Azure Machine Learning offers added capabilities at lower cost
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning Enterprise Edition (preview) and Basic Edition are merging on September 22, 2020. This change does not cause any downtime or impact existing deployments.

value.title: Azure Cognitive Search - Managed identity support and Private Endpoints are GA
value.excerpt: You can now request Azure Cognitive Search to create an outbound private endpoint connection in order to securely access data from such data sources via indexers . You can also create identity for a search service in Azure Active Directory, then use RBAC permissions to grant the identity permissions

value.title: Azure Machine Learning updates Ignite 2020
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning is bringing new capabilities to customers at no additional cost. Azure Machine Learning designer and automated ML UI are now generally available.

value.title: Build powerful and responsible AI solutions with Azure
value.excerpt: As organizations assess safely reopening and continue navigating unexpected shifts in the world, getting insights to respond in an agile and conscientious manner is vital.

value.title: Better outcomes with AI: Frost & Sullivan names Microsoft the leading AI platform for healthcare IT
value.excerpt: Frost & Sullivan have recognized Microsoft as the “undisputed leader” in global AI platforms for the healthcare IT sector.

value.title: Bringing AI supercomputing to customers
value.excerpt: The trend toward the use of massive AI models to power a large number of tasks is changing how AI is built and applied to enable powerful new capabilities.

value.title: Aiming for more than just net zero
value.excerpt: Many companies are reaching for net zero emissions, but we’re taking it even further.
